articles.title: Airline Delays and Cancellations Linger After New York-Area Snowstorm
articles.mainIdea: Airline Delays and Cancellations Linger After New York-Area Snowstorm
articles.summary: The Wall Street Journal: Airline Delays and Cancellations Linger After New York-Area Snowstorm. More than 400 flights to or from New York-area airports were canceled Saturday, disrupting the postholiday travel surge. Related tickers mentioned: JBLU.
